title: Purpose and Values - Chong Medicine
sitename: Chong Medicine - Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic Focused on Women's Health in Encinitas, California
cleaned_text: Doctor of Acupuncture & Chinese Medicine Acupuncturist and Herbalist For Women's Health Energy & Somatic Healer Integrity Patients are people. We uphold integrity and respect for each person we care for, irrespective of gender, age, and race. We act reasonably, professionally, and with respect in all we do. Caring We care for your well-being, culture, and custom. We may not do whatever you ask of us that will jeopardize our integrity, but we only perform services that can help you feel better and heal faster in the long term. Confidential We will never reveal your information unless you give us written permission (HIPPA Compliant). However, we love reviews and referrals and accept constructive improvement suggestions to continue to do what we do best - taking care of you. Excellence We put you and our patients at the center of what we do. We deliver the best expertise, skills, and services to everyone whenever we can. Stewardship When you entrust us with your care, we stay independent and can agree/disagree regardless of the mainstream or current popular ideas. We have the courage to practice our traditional Chinese medicine and champion its solutions to benefit your long-term wellness plan. With that, we can get to the root cause of your ailment and help you live a better and higher quality of life. Traditional Chinese Medicine and acupuncture has been proven to work for over 2,500+ years. To Learn How Chong Acupuncture Can Treat Your Specific Condition, Call Today for a Free Phone Consultation: 760-517-8878 | [BOOK AN APPOINTMENT](https://chongmedicine.com/contact/#appt-link) STAY IN THE KNOW / Serious about your health goals...
